posts._title: Fred Scott – Being a Human Person (2020)
posts.title: Being a Human Person
posts.excerpt: At 76, Swedish auteur Roy Andersson is about to complete his last film. With the end of his career in sight, the central thematic concerns of Roy’s work – vulnerability, insecurity and mortality – spill over into his creative process. Over the course of a career spanning decades, he’s remained enigmatic and reclusive… until now.
